    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_MIN_SIMILARITY

        public static double DEFAULT_MIN_SIMILARITY
        The minimum similarity needed to see two words as similar
        See Also:
        FindWord(String, double)

      • PRECISE_SEARCH

        public static boolean PRECISE_SEARCH
        If true the FindWord(String, double) method searches for the word with the best match. This gives slightly better results but also takes much more time.

                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads word database from CSV file.
        Parameters:
        file - CSV file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws exception if file could not be read of has wrong format
        See Also:

      • SetWord

        public static void SetWord(java.lang.String word,
                           Word.Tendency tendency,
                           java.lang.String effect)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        The method updates the given entry in the database.
        Parameters:
        word - The word to update in database
        tendency - The words Word.Tendency
        effect - The words effect
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws exception if the file database file could not be updated

      • RemoveWord

        public static void RemoveWord(java.lang.String word)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Removes entry from database and writes the database to the file
        Parameters:
        word - The word to remove from the database
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If file could not be saved
        See Also:

      • FindWord

        public static DatabaseHandler.Entry FindWord(java.lang.String word,
                                             double minSimilarity)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        If PRECISE_SEARCH is true the function searches for closest word in database and returns a copy of the entry. Else the first word, which has a higher similarity than the given minimum, is taken.
        Parameters:
        word - The word to find the attributes for
        minSimilarity - The minimum similarity between to strings, to count them as the same word
        Returns:
        The WordAttributes or null if it was not found in the database
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws exception if database was not loaded jet
        See Also:
        levenshteinDistance(CharSequence, CharSequence)
